titleStmt.title: Turner Mayor. Martis, vicesimo sexto die Januarii, 1668. Annʹoque Regni Regis Caroli Secundi, Dei grat', Angliæ, &c. vicesimo. This Court having received often complaints from many worthy citizens, merchants and traders, that frequent the burse of Royal Exchange of this city about their affairs, contracts and matters of negotiation, of the great inconveniences arising to themselves ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher, printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Title from heading and first lines of text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
